- All players are hostile - Hostile players can attack and kill other players - When players are killed, their equipment is damaged or destroyed, and can be looted by anyone - Killed players must respawn

- You can set yourself to "hostile" using the button by your portrait - Hostile players can attack and kill other players - When players are killed, their equipment is damaged or destroyed, and can be looted by anyone - Killed players must respawn - Any cluster of more than 10 players will show up on the minimap

- You can set yourself to "hostile" using the button by your portrait - Hostile players can attack and knock down other players - Everyone can see the number of hostile players in the area - Non-hostile players gain a bonus against hostile players - When players are knocked down, some of their equipment's durability is converted into silver and dropped - Knocked down players can get back up, or choose to respawn, leaving their equipment as loot
Estates are plots of land you can acquire to construct various buildings. You can share or trade them with other players.
There are many different native factions living in Albion, each with their unique strengths and weaknesses.
Buildings in this area cannot be built or upgraded beyond this tier.

There are four different security levels: Safe, Yellow, Red, and Black. In Safe, you cannot attack other players and others cannot loot your corpse for a certain period after death. In Yellow, attacking other players is permitted if flagged for PvP, but attacking a non criminal player causes you to be marked as a criminal for some time. Criminals can be attacked freely and suffer a penalty to their combat strength. In Red, players flagged for PvP may attack other players freely without any penalties. In Black, everyone is flagged for PvP.

Spieler ist erfolgreich der Gilde beigetreten!
You are already in a Guild!
Do you want to apply to this Guild?

It is a time of great change in the lands of Albion. The mists have parted, and the King has come with his armies and his settlers, to colonise Albion and claim it for his own.
The land, though, is not empty. The Keepers of Albion, the Heretics, the Undead and the Disciples of Morgana are all pursuing their own goals. If the King wishes to bring Albion under his rule, he's going to have a fight on his hands...
Welcome to Closed Beta!
Use the Shortcuts Q, W, E, R, D or F to activate your spells.
The shortcut for the worldmap is "K".
Your armor loses durability when being hit, and your weapons similarly when hitting something. You can repair your armor and weapons in cities.
If you want to change the spells on your gear, you are able to reforge them at the repair station.
There is a chance that an item you're wearing or carrying might be destroyed completely when you die.
When you move into another area you are invincible for a short duration, but you can't attack while that effect lasts.
Press Shift + Enter to write in the /all channel by default.
Press Alt + Enter to write in the /guild channel by default.
Press Ctrl + Enter to write in the /local channel by default.
You can send someone a /whisper which only they can read.
Buildings lose durability with usage and over time. Don't forget to repair them.
Crop seeds and baby animals are more expensive on player islands.
Marketplaces are local, so transporting goods from one place to another can yield riches.
Plate Armor is weak against magical damage, while Cloth Armor is weak against physical damage.
When you target a player, you can see what kind of spells he has equipped above his name (at the top of the screen).
While in "PVP Enabled" areas, make sure to keep an eye on the hostile counter.
Please report any bugs you encounter using #bug.
You will always respawn next to your player house. If you don't have one you will respawn in the nearest city.
When you write in the /local channel, only people in your region can read your message.
In Guild vs Guild warfare, if you never attack an adjacent territory, you will accumulate a significant defender bonus over time.
The longer an animal or enemy has been alive, the more resources or silver you will get when you kill it. Environmental resources also regenerate over time in a similar way.
Beware the bunnies. They have a plan!
Owning a castle guarantees you taxes on all silver collected in the area. These will be paid into your Guild's account.
Joining a Guild is highly reccomended!
A building can only be removed by its owner, or by high ranking members of the Guild owning the territory.
The initial owner of a building is the one who placed the construction ground.

The owner of a building can change: If you lose or give up your real estate and another player claims it, he will be owner of all buildings placed on it. Your battle vault will always remain yours, though.
Plate Armor is strongest against Physical damage, while Cloth Armor is strongest against Magical damage. Leather works reasonably well against both damage types.
You need special destruction hammers to destroy buildings or castle gates.
In a Guild vs Guild siege, you will lose points every 100 seconds if you hold fewer than two orbs.
In Guild vs Guild warfare, if you never attack an adjacent territory, you will accumulate a significant defender bonus over time.
Higher-tier tools will gather resources faster.
Your tools will lose durability faster if their tier is below the resource's tier.
The amount of fame you get for a player kill is determined by the value of the equipment and items your victim was carrying.
Each item has a value that represents their rarity. T2 resources have a value of 1, T3 ressources have a value of 3, T4 resources a value of 9 and so on...
Spells have a color code: red: damage; green: heal; blue: buff; purple: debuff; yellow: crowd control; white: movement.
Wearing a bag will increase the weight you can carry before getting a movement penalty. The higher the bag's tier, the higher the carrying capacity bonus.
Follow the roads to avoid running into too many enemies!
In every city there is a bank that you can use to store items, and a battle vault where you can store your equipment.
Type /suicide in the chat window to kill yourself. (But why would you do that?)
Type /stuck in the chat window if your character is stuck somewhere and you cannot move any more.

The closed beta is currently only open for Epic, Legendary and Veteran founders.
Click "Redeem Code" to redeem a founder code you have purchased, or click "Purchase Code" to purchase a code.

Dieser Test ist nur für Epic und Legendary Founders offen

Privacy Policy
This privacy policy from Sandbox Interactive GmbH, Bornholmer Strasse 71, 10439 Berlin, Germany (hereinafter referred to as “Sandbox Interactive” or “we” or “us”) informs you of the kind, the scope and the purpose, as well as your rights concerning your data collected and processed by Sandbox Interactive on and in relation to its website. Sandbox Interactive is committed to safeguarding your personal information. Whenever you provide such information, Sandbox Interactive is legally obliged to use your information in line with all laws concerning the protection of your personal information.
1. Personal Data and its Use
You can use our website without disclosing personal information. Personal data is only collected if you will provide it voluntarily to us, while visiting our website.
a) Contacting
For inquiries about our services you may be asked to enter personal data that is mandatory to process your requests (name, address, e-mail address, phone number, used hard- or software, etc.).Before your personal data is sent to us and stored into our database, you will be asked for approval. Further, you are prompted to confirm that you have read this privacy policy in its currently valid version and that you fully accept it. All personal data you submitted to us is used solely to process your requests. There is no sharing of this personal data to third parties.
b) Competitions and Polls
If you wish to take part in any poll, survey or competition run through our community and websites, we will also use your information for the purposes specified in the poll, survey or competition. We may also save your IP-address and a specific cookie for the duration of the poll, survey or competition to ensure singular participations
c) Newsletter
You may subscribe to receive our email newsletters you will need submit your email-address and optional your name. We will provide those newsletter(s) to you free of charge, unless otherwise stated. Our newsletters may contain promotions or advertisements relating to goods or services provided by us or our group companies and associated third parties from time to time. If at any time you wish to unsubscribe from an email newsletter you may do so by following the unsubscribe instructions giving you in every newsletter.
d) Community & Game Accounts
In order to make use of certain services provided through us, such as the community (message boards, chat rooms, forums, etc.) or game accounts you will need to register an account with us. When you do so, you will provide us with information about yourself and you will be able to select how we use your information for marketing purposes. You can update your marketing preferences at any time by following the instructions to amend your details in the account registration section. We will only use your information in accordance with your instructions and as set out in this privacy policy.
2. Logfiles
During every visit of websites information about IP address, referring URL, date/time, browser version and operating system is stored in the webservers log files due to technical reasons. Further so called cookies may partially be stored temporary on your local computer. Cookies are small text files that are temporarily stored on your hard drive and contain information about your visit to our website. This data is needed only due to technical reasons and in no way it will be associated with any individual person. An evaluation is done only in the form of anonymous statistics.
3. Statistic Data
This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. (“Google”). Google Analytics uses “cookies”, which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users use the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website (including your IP address truncated by the last octet prior to its storage using the “_anonymizeIp()” method) will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States. Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of the website, compiling reports on website activity for website operators and providing other services relating to website activity and internet usage. Google may also transfer this information to third parties where required to do so by law, or where such third parties process the information on Google’s behalf. Google will not associate your IP address with any other data held by Google. You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser, however please note that if you do this you may not be able to use the full functionality of this website. By using this website, you consent to the processing of data about you by Google in the manner and for the purposes set out above. You can opt-out from being tracked by Google Analytics with effect for the future by downloading and installing Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on for your current web browser: http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=en.
4. Integration of Content from External Providers
In our website we have integrated browser plug-ins and links of social networks and providers of video content (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, YouTube). These services are operated by third parties that have their headquarters partially outside the EU or the EEA. This browser plug-ins and links are identified by logos or other notes at our websites. In the context of the use of this content a connection between your computer (browser) and the servers of the provider is established. This will forward the information about your visit to our website together with your IP address to the provider. This information may then be assigned by the provider to your existing account at this provider. This may apply especially, if you are logged in to your account at the time of the usage of the plug-in on the website. For the information on the purpose and scope of data collection and procession by the service providers, as well as your rights in this respect and settings options for protecting your privacy please visit the service provider privacy policy. You can prevent the transmission of data. Please refer to the point “protecting your privacy” in this policy.
5. Use of Facebook Social Plug-ins
Our website uses social plug-ins (“plug-ins”) provided by the social network facebook.com, operated by Facebook Inc., 1601 S. California Avenue, Palo Alto, CA 94304, USA (“Facebook”). The plug-ins are identifiable by a Facebook logo (white letter f on blue background or a thumb up icon) or the notice “Facebook Social Plug-in”. For a full list of all social plug-ins please see http://developers.facebook.com/plugins. When you visit a page of our website that contains a social plug-in, your browser establishes a direct connection to Facebook servers. Facebook directly transfers the plug-in content to your browser which embeds the latter into the website, enabling Facebook to receive information about your having accessed the respective page of our website. Thus we have no influence on the data gathered by the plug-in and inform you according to our state of knowledge. The embedded plug-ins provide Facebook with the information that you have accessed the corresponding page of our website. If you are logged into Facebook, your visit can be assigned to your Facebook account. If you interact with the plug-ins, e.g. by clicking “Like”, or entering a comment, the corresponding information is transmitted from your browser directly to Facebook and stored by it. Even if you are not logged into Facebook, there is possibility that the plug-ins transmits your IP address to Facebook. For the information on the purpose and scope of data collection and procession by Facebook, as well as your rights in this respect and settings options for protecting your privacy please visit Facebook’s privacy policy: http://www.facebook.com/policy.php. If you are a Facebook member and do not want Facebook to connect the data concerning your visit to our website with your member data already stored by Facebook, please log off from Facebook before entering our website. Further you can block Facebook Social Plug-ins by using add-ons for your browser, like the “Facebook Blocker”.
6. Use of Twitter-Buttons
Our websites uses a social plugin provided by the social network “Twitter”, operated by Twitter Inc., 795 Folsom St., Suite 600, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA. The plugins are identifiable by a “Tweet” or “Follow”- logo recognizable with a blue bird on white background. When you visit a page of our websites that contains a “Twitter”-plugin, your browser establishes a direct connection to Twitter’s servers. Twitter Inc. directly transfers the plugin content to your browser which embeds the latter into the website, enabling Twitter Inc. to receive information about your having accessed the respective page of our website. Thus we have no influence on the data gathered by any “Twitter”-plugin and inform you according to our state of knowledge. For the information on the purpose and scope of data collection and procession by Twitter Inc., as well as your rights in this respect and settings options for protecting your privacy please visit Twitter’s privacy policy: http://twitter.com/privacy
7. Disclosure to Third Parties
We will only disclose personal, aggregated information to third parties when this is legally allowed or when you agree. If any third party is organizing and/or managing any promotion, competition, survey or poll run through our websites on our behalf, we may disclose your information to that third party to enable them to do so but they will be prohibited from using your information for any other purpose, unless you have given them specific consent.
8. Service
If you have any concern about privacy at our website, apply your rights to request a copy of the personal information we hold about you and want to have any inaccuracies corrected or require the deletion of this data, please get in touch: E-Mail: info@sandbox-interactive.com Web: www.albiononline.com/contact/ We will use reasonable efforts to supply, correct or delete personal information about you on our files. Even if you have any questions or want more detailed information, please send us an e-mail.
9. Changes to Privacy Policy
This privacy policy may be updated from time to time so you may wish to check it each time you submit personal information to us.
Effective: February 2013

Diese wahnsinnigen, ketzerischen Anhänger haben es geschafft, sich selbst Magie beizubringen – was für ein Gedanke! Bitte halte ihren Fortschritt auf. Es wird noch mehr interessante Aufgaben für dich geben, wenn du dich jetzt beweisen kannst.

Ces fous d'Hérétiques ont réussi à apprendre la magie, c'est horrible ! Je vous en prie, stoppez leur progression. D'autres missions plus intéressantes vous attendent, à condition de faire vos preuves maintenant.
Подумать только, эти безумные еретики где-то научились магии! Прошу вас, остановите их. Если вы хорошо себя покажете, мы сможем вам предложить другие интересные задания.
Ci szaleni Heretycy jakoś zdołali nauczyć się magii – kto by pomyślał! Proszę, powstrzymaj ich. Jeśli się teraz wykażesz, dostaniesz wkrótce więcej interesujących zleceń.
Esos herejes dementes han aprendido a hacer magia. ¡No quiero ni pensarlo! Por favor, detén sus avances. Habrá más trabajos interesantes para ti si demuestras lo que vales ahora.
Esses hereges ensandecidos conseguiram aprender alguma magia — que perigo! Impeça o progresso deles. Haverá trabalhos interessantes para você se conseguir mostrar o seu valor.
Are they still out there playing with their fire?
Sind sie immer noch da draußen und spielen mit ihrem Feuer?
Sont-ils toujours en train de jouer avec le feu ?
Ну как, они все еще играют с огнем?
Czy oni nadal igrają z ogniem?
¿Aún andan por ahí jugando con su fuego?
Eles ainda estão brincando com fogo?
Some sneaky bastards have been stealing our supplies. Go teach them a lesson, and I might be impressed.
Einige hinterhältige Mistkerle haben unsere Vorräte gestohlen. Erteile ihnen eine Lektion, dann bin ich vielleicht beeindruckt.
De sales petits voleurs pillent nos provisions. Allez leur donner une leçon, et cela m'impressionnera peut-être.
Похоже, какие-то гады повадились тырить у нас продовольствие. Чтобы заслужить мое доверие, преподайте им урок.
Jacyś podstępni niegodziwcy wykradają nasze zapasy. Daj im nauczkę, a może zrobisz na mnie wrażenie.
Algunos cabrones rateros nos han estado robando las provisiones. Dales una lección y puede que me impresiones.
Uns larápios andaram roubando nossos suprimentos. Dê-lhes uma lição — talvez eu me impressione.
Somebody stole an entire table yesterday. What are they up to out there?
Irgendjemand hat gestern eine ganze Mahlzeit gestohlen. Was haben sie dort draußen vor?
Quelqu'un a volé une table entière hier. Qu'est-ce qu'ils préparent ?
Вчера кто-то украл целый стол с припасами. Кто знает, что будет дальше…
Ktoś ukradł wczoraj cały stół. Co oni knują?
Alguien robó una mesa entera ayer. ¿Qué estarán tramando por ahí?
Alguém roubou uma mesa ontem. O que será que eles estão aprontando?
Want to prove your worth? Head out and take down some long-ranged foes - and try not to die in the process.
Möchtest du dich bewähren? Gehe hinaus und schalte einige Fernkampf-Gegner aus – und versuche, dabei nicht zu sterben.
Vous cherchez à faire vos preuves ? Allez éliminer quelques ennemis à longue portée. Et essayez de ne pas mourir au passage.
Хотите показать свою доблесть? Нужно устранить засаду стрелков – ну, и постарайтесь не погибнуть сами.
Chcesz dowieść swojej wartości? Udaj się na wyprawę i pokonaj nieco dystansowych przeciwników. Postaraj się nie zginąć w trakcie.
¿Quieres demostrar lo que vales? Sal afuera y ocúpate de algunos enemigos que usen armas de largo alcance, pero intenta que no te maten en el intento.
Quer mostrar o seu valor? Vá e enfrente inimigos de ataque à distância — e tente não morrer no processo.
Did they manage to puncture your armour? No? How about your ego?
Haben sie es geschafft, deine Rüstung zu durchbrechen? Nein? Und dein Ego?
Ont-ils réussi à percer votre armure ? Non ? Et votre ego ?
Они случайно не повредили вашу броню? А как насчет самолюбия?
Zdołali cię zranić? Nie? A twoje ego?
¿Han conseguido atravesar tu armadura? ¿No? ¿Y tu ego?
Eles conseguiram perfurar a sua armadura? Não? E o seu ego?
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
Du hast immerhin minimale Kompetenz gezeigt. Bringe dies zu [variable:AGENT_A] und du erhältst vielleicht eine interessante Aufgabe.
Vous semblez avoir au moins quelques compétences rudimentaires. Apportez ceci à [variable:AGENT_A] et vous obtiendrez peut-être des missions plus intéressantes.
Похоже, вам можно доверять. Вот, возьмите. Вас ожидает [variable:AGENT_A] и новые интересные задания.
Stwierdzam, że udało ci się wykazać co najmniej podstawowe umiejętności. Adresatem tego listu jest [variable:AGENT_A]. Dostarcz go, a może dostaniesz więcej ciekawych zleceń.
Por lo menos has demostrado un mínimo de competencia. Llévale esto a [variable:AGENT_A] y puede que te ofrezca algún trabajillo interesante.
Você mostrou ter um mínimo de competência. Leve isto para [variable:AGENT_A], é possível que haja trabalhos interessantes para você.
You have the letter of recommendation?
Vous avez la lettre de recommandation ?

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Bows for the hunting of rabbits and other game, because I'm sick of porridge already.

Der König hat jeder Person, welche die auf dem angehängten Arbeitsauftrag aufgeführten Gegenstände herstellt, einen Zuschuss in Silber zugesichert.
Bogen für die Jagd auf Kaninchen und anderes Wild, da ich Haferbrei nicht mehr sehen kann.

Le Roi a accordé une subvention en argent à quiconque fabriquera les objets mentionnés dans l'ordre de mission ci-joint, pour la raison suivante :
« Des arcs pour la chasse aux lapins et autres proies, parce que j'en ai assez du porridge. »

Король приказал наградить серебром того, кто сможет смастерить пару вещей на благо королевства. Хотите знать, зачем?
Нам нужны луки для охоты на кроликов. А то устал я уже каждый день жрать овощи.

Król przekaże zapłatę w srebrze temu, kto wykona przedmioty wyszczególnione na załączonym zamówieniu. Powód:
Łuki do polowania na króliki i inną zwierzynę, ponieważ dość już mam owsianki.

Zbieranie podstawowych surowców potrzebnych nowo przybyłym do Albionu wymaga narzędzi.

El Rey ha aprobado una subvención de plata para cualquier persona que cree los objetos de la lista que acompaña a la orden de trabajo. Razón:
Recolectar recursos básicos que ayuden a los recién llegados a Albion requiere herramientas.

O rei autorizou um subsídio em prata para todos que produzirem os itens relacionados pelos respectivos motivos na ordem de serviço anexa:
Coleta de recursos básicos para ajudar os recém-chegados a Albion que precisarem de ferramentas.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.
Bitte melde es deinem zugeteilten Handwerkskontakt, wenn der Auftrag erledigt ist.
Veuillez vous présenter au contact de fabrication qui vous a été assigné quand le travail sera terminé.
Когда работа будет выполнена, доложите своему ремесленнику.
Po ukończeniu pracy zgłoś się do przydzielonego urzędnika zajmującego się sprawami rzemiosła.
Dirígete a tu Contacto de artesanía asignado cuando completes el trabajo.
Quando concluir o trabalho, fale com seu contato de artesania designado.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Swords and shields needed for defense of settlements in Heretic-infested regions.

Der König hat jeder Person, welche die auf dem angehängten Arbeitsauftrag aufgeführten Gegenstände herstellt, einen Zuschuss in Silber zugesichert.
Schwerter und Schilde werden für die Verteidigung der Siedlungen in von Ketzern heimgesuchten Regionen benötigt.

Le Roi a accordé une subvention en argent à quiconque fabriquera les objets mentionnés dans l'ordre de mission ci-joint, pour la raison suivante :
« Besoin d'épées et de boucliers pour défendre les colonies dans les régions infestées d'Hérétiques. »

Король приказал наградить серебром того, кто сможет смастерить пару вещей на благо королевства. Хотите знать, зачем?
Нужны мечи и щиты для защиты поселений в землях, где много еретиков.

Król przekaże zapłatę w srebrze temu, kto wykona przedmioty wyszczególnione na załączonym zamówieniu. Powód:
Miecze i tarcze potrzebne do obrony osad w regionach, w których rozpanoszyli się Heretycy.

El Rey ha aprobado una subvención de plata para cualquier persona que cree los objetos de la lista que acompaña a la orden de trabajo. Razón:
Se necesitan espadas y escudos para defender los asentamientos en regiones infestadas de herejes.

O rei autorizou um subsídio em prata para todos que produzirem os itens relacionados pelos respectivos motivos na ordem de serviço anexa:
Espadas e escudos para a defesa dos assentamentos em regiões infestadas de hereges.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.
Bitte melde es deinem zugeteilten Handwerkskontakt, wenn der Auftrag erledigt ist.
Veuillez vous présenter au contact de fabrication qui vous a été assigné quand le travail sera terminé.
Когда работа будет выполнена, доложите своему ремесленнику.
Po ukończeniu pracy zgłoś się do przydzielonego urzędnika zajmującego się sprawami rzemiosła.
Dirígete a tu Contacto de artesanía asignado cuando completes el trabajo.
Quando concluir o trabalho, fale com seu contato de artesania designado.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Armor needed for gatherers building new settlements.

Der König hat jeder Person, welche die auf dem angehängten Arbeitsauftrag aufgeführten Gegenstände herstellt, einen Zuschuss in Silber zugesichert.
Rüstung wird für Sammler benötigt, die neue Siedlungen bauen.

Le Roi a accordé une subvention en argent à quiconque fabriquera les objets mentionnés dans l'ordre de mission ci-joint, pour la raison suivante :
« Besoin d'armures pour les collecteurs construisant de nouvelles colonies. »

Король приказал наградить серебром того, кто сможет смастерить пару вещей на благо королевства. Хотите знать, зачем?
Наши собиратели строят новые поселения, и им нужно снаряжение для защиты.

Król przekaże zapłatę w srebrze temu, kto wykona przedmioty wyszczególnione na załączonym zamówieniu. Powód:
Zbroje potrzebne dla zbieraczy budujących nowe osady.

El Rey ha aprobado una subvención de plata para cualquier persona que cree los objetos de la lista que acompaña a la orden de trabajo. Razón:
Se necesitan armaduras para los recolectores que construyen nuevos asentamientos.

O rei autorizou um subsídio em prata para todos que produzirem os itens relacionados pelos respectivos motivos na ordem de serviço anexa:
Precisa-se de armaduras para os coletores construírem novos assentamentos.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.
Bitte melde es deinem zugeteilten Handwerkskontakt, wenn der Auftrag erledigt ist.
Veuillez vous présenter au contact de fabrication qui vous a été assigné quand le travail sera terminé.
Когда работа будет выполнена, доложите своему ремесленнику.
Po ukończeniu pracy zgłoś się do przydzielonego urzędnika zajmującego się sprawami rzemiosła.
Dirígete a tu Contacto de artesanía asignado cuando completes el trabajo.
Quando concluir o trabalho, fale com seu contato de artesania designado.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Warrior's equipment needed for guards at city gates.

Der König hat jeder Person, welche die auf dem angehängten Arbeitsauftrag aufgeführten Gegenstände herstellt, einen Zuschuss in Silber zugesichert.
Kriegerausrüstung wird für die Wachen an den Stadttoren benötigt.

Le Roi a accordé une subvention en argent à quiconque fabriquera les objets mentionnés dans l'ordre de mission ci-joint, pour la raison suivante :
« Besoin d'équipement de guerrier pour les gardes aux portes de la ville. »

Король приказал наградить серебром того, кто сможет смастерить пару вещей на благо королевства. Хотите знать, зачем?
Стражникам городских ворот нужно снаряжение.

Król przekaże zapłatę w srebrze temu, kto wykona przedmioty wyszczególnione na załączonym zamówieniu. Powód:
Wyposażenie wojowników potrzebne dla strażników strzegących bram miasta.

El Rey ha aprobado una subvención de plata para cualquier persona que cree los objetos de la lista que acompaña a la orden de trabajo. Razón:
Se necesitan equipos de guerrero para los guardias de las puertas de la ciudad.

O rei autorizou um subsídio em prata para todos que produzirem os itens relacionados pelos respectivos motivos na ordem de serviço anexa:
Equipamento de guerreiro necessário para os guardas nos portões da cidade.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.
Bitte melde es deinem zugeteilten Handwerkskontakt, wenn der Auftrag erledigt ist.
Veuillez vous présenter au contact de fabrication qui vous a été assigné quand le travail sera terminé.
Когда работа будет выполнена, доложите своему ремесленнику.
Po ukończeniu pracy zgłoś się do przydzielonego urzędnika zajmującego się sprawami rzemiosła.
Dirígete a tu Contacto de artesanía asignado cuando completes el trabajo.
Quando concluir o trabalho, fale com seu contato de artesania designado.

If we're going to survive here, we're going to need some basic buildings - starting with lumbermills and a stonemasons, and working up from there. Go out and get us some decent wood and stone so we can get to work.

Wenn wir hier überleben wollen, werden wir einige grundlegende Gebäude brauchen – angefangen mit Sägemühlen und Steinmetzen, worauf dann aufgebaut werden kann. Gehe hinaus und hole etwas ordentliches Holz und Gestein, sodass wir mit der Arbeit anfangen können.

Si nous voulons survivre ici, nous allons avoir besoin de quelques bâtiments essentiels, à commencer par des scieries et des tailleurs de pierre. Nous nous développerons par la suite. Allez nous chercher du bois et de la pierre de qualité afin que nous puissions nous mettre au travail.
Чтобы выжить в этих краях, нам нужно построить хотя бы основные сооружения. Для начала – лесопилки и каменоломни, чтобы было где работать. Соберите камней и древесины, и мы начнем строительство.

Jeśli mamy tu przetrwać, będziemy potrzebować kilku podstawowych budynków. Zaczniemy od tartaków i warsztatów kamieniarskich. Ruszaj i przynieś nam nieco porządnego drewna i kamienia, żebyśmy mogli zabrać się do pracy.

Si queremos sobrevivir aquí, necesitaremos algunos edificios básicos, empezando por un aserradero y un cantero, y lo que haga falta a partir de ahí. Ve y tráenos madera y piedra para que podamos empezar a trabajar.
Se quisermos sobreviver aqui, precisaremos de construções básicas — começaremos com serrarias e canteiros e partiremos para outras depois dessas. Pegue madeira e pedra para começarmos a trabalhar.
How's your stock of building supplies coming along?
Wie sieht dein Vorrat an Baumaterialien aus?
Comment évolue votre stock de matériaux de construction ?
Jak idzie ci zbieranie surowców do budowy?
¿Cómo van tus reservas de materiales de construcción?
Como está o estoque de suprimentos?
Our hunters need new bows and armor if they're going to find us food! Go collect some good wood and fresh hides so we can have some crafted.
Unsere Jäger brauchen neue Bogen und Rüstungen, wenn sie uns Nahrungsmittel beschaffen sollen! Gehe und sammle etwas gutes Holz und frische Häute, damit wir welche herstellen können.
Nos chasseurs ont besoin de nouveaux arcs et de nouvelles armures pour nous ramener de la nourriture ! Allez chercher du bon bois et des peaux de bête pour que nous puissions en fabriquer.
Чтобы добывать нам еду, охотникам нужны луки и кожанки! Принесите древесины и шкур, и мастера сделают все необходимое.
Nasi myśliwi potrzebują nowych łuków i zbroi, aby zdobywać dla nas pożywienie! Zbierz nieco porządnego drewna i świeżych skór, z których wykonamy niezbędne wyposażenie.
¡Nuestros cazadores necesitan arcos y armaduras para encontrar comida! Sal a buscar madera y pieles frescas para poder fabricarles algo.
Nossos cassadores precisam de arcos e armaduras para pegarem comida para nós! Pegue uma madeira boa e pelegos frescos para a produção.
See that rabbit? If we had some hunters around, I could be having rabbit stew for dinner...
Siehst du das Kaninchen? Wenn wir ein paar Jäger hätten, könnte ich heute Abend Haseneintopf essen …
Vous voyez ce lapin ? Si nous avions des chasseurs, je pourrais avoir du ragoût de lapin au dîner...
Видите вон того кролика? А если бы у охотников были луки, у нас на ужин было бы кроличье рагу.
Widzisz tego królika? Gdybyśmy mieli tu myśliwych, dzisiaj na kolację byłby gulasz z królika…
¿Ves ese conejo? Si tuviésemos algún cazador, esta noche me lo cenaría guisado...
Está vendo aquele coelho? Se tivéssemos caçadores por aqui, teríamos guizado de coelho no jantar...
Some magical defenses would be grand. Go out and gather some cotton, wood and iron so we can start equipping mages.
Ein paar magische Verteidigungsanlagen wären gut. Gehe hinaus und sammle etwas Baumwolle, Holz und Eisen, damit wir anfangen können, Magier auszurüsten.
Ce serait formidable d'avoir des défenses magiques. Allez chercher du coton, du bois et du fer pour que nous puissions commencer à équiper des mages.
Нам бы очень не помешала магическая защита. Соберите хлопка, дерева и железа, и мы сможем вооружить наших магов.
Przydałaby się jakaś magiczna ochrona. Zbierz nieco bawełny, drewna i żelaza, żebyśmy mogli zacząć wyposażać magów.
Sería magnífico tener defensas mágicas. Sal a buscar algodón, madera y hierro para que podamos equipar a los magos.
Umas defesas mágicas viriam a calhar. Vá pegar algodão, madeira e ferro para começarmos a equipar os magos.
I could really do with some magical healing right now - I gave myself a paper cut.
Ich könnte jetzt wirklich etwas magische Heilung gebrauchen – ich habe mich an Papier geschnitten.
J'aurais bien besoin de soins magiques en ce moment... Le bord du papier est vraiment tranchant.
Я порезался листом бумаги, и мне бы совсем не помешал маг-целитель.
Przydałaby mi się teraz uzdrawiająca magia. Kartka przecięła mi skórę na palcu.
No me vendría nada mal un poco de curación mágica, que me he cortado con un papel.
Seria ótimo fazer uma magia de cura agora — cortei meu dedo na borda de um papel.
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
Du hast immerhin minimale Kompetenz gezeigt. Bringe dies zu [variable:AGENT_A] und du erhältst vielleicht eine interessante Aufgabe.
Vous semblez avoir au moins quelques compétences rudimentaires. Apportez ceci à [variable:AGENT_A] et vous obtiendrez peut-être des missions plus intéressantes.
Похоже, вам можно доверять. Вот, возьмите. Вас ожидает [variable:AGENT_A] и новые интересные задания.
Stwierdzam, że udało ci się wykazać co najmniej podstawowe umiejętności. Adresatem tego listu jest [variable:AGENT_A]. Dostarcz go, a może dostaniesz więcej ciekawych zleceń.
Por lo menos has demostrado un mínimo de competencia. Llévale esto a [variable:AGENT_A] y puede que te ofrezca algún trabajillo interesante.
Você mostrou ter um mínimo de competência. Leve isto para [variable:AGENT_A], é possível que haja trabalhos interessantes para você.
You have the letter of recommendation?
Vous avez la lettre de recommandation ?
Tools, that's what we need! More tools means more gathering means more resources means more tools. It's the circle of production! How beautiful!
Werkzeuge sind das, was wir brauchen! Mehr Werkzeuge bedeutet mehr Sammeln bedeutet mehr Ressourcen bedeutet mehr Werkzeuge. Das ist der Produktionszyklus. Wie herrlich!
Des outils, voilà ce dont nous avons besoin ! Plus d'outils, pour plus de collecte, plus de ressources, et encore plus d'outils. C'est le cycle de production ! Quelle merveille !
Инструменты! Вот что нам нужно! Больше инструментов – значит больше ресурсов – значит еще больше инструментов. Как он прекрасен, этот замкнутый круг производства!
Narzędzia. Tak, właśnie tego nam potrzeba! Więcej narzędzi to więcej surowców, więcej surowców to więcej narzędzi. Oto koło produkcji! Czyż to nie wspaniałe?!

¡Herramientas, eso necesitamos! Más herramientas es igual a más medios de recolección, lo que es igual a más recursos, lo que es igual a más herramientas. ¡Es el ciclo de la producción! ¡Qué preciosidad!
Ferramentas! É disso que precisamos! Quando mais ferramentas, mais recursos; quando mais recursos, mais ferramentas. É o círculo produtivo! Que lindo!
Of course, you need tools in order to... never mind, you'll figure it out.
Natürlich brauchst du Werkzeuge, um … Egal, du findest es schon heraus.
Bien sûr, vous aurez besoin d'outils pour... enfin, vous verrez.
О да, чем больше инструментов, тем больше… ну, вы поняли.
Oczywiście potrzebujesz narzędzi, żeby… Nieważne, odkryjesz to bez mojej pomocy.
Está claro que necesitas herramientas para... Es igual, ya lo comprenderás.
Claro, precisamos de ferramentas para... Enfim, deixa para lá, você entendeu.
We'll need some well-equipped warriors to defend our buildings. Here's a gathering-list that should give you enough to put together some solid gear.
Wir werden einige gut ausgerüstete Krieger zur Verteidigung unserer Gebäude brauchen. Hier ist eine Sammelliste, die dir helfen sollte, eine solide Rüstung zusammenzustellen.
Nous allons avoir besoin de guerriers bien équipés pour défendre nos bâtiments. Voici une liste de collecte qui devrait vous permettre de constituer des équipements robustes.
Для защиты поселения нам нужны хорошо вооруженные воины. Вот что нужно, чтобы достойно их снарядить.
Potrzebujemy dobrze uzbrojonych wojowników, żeby strzegli naszych budynków. Masz tutaj listę surowców, z których będzie można wytworzyć jakieś porządne wyposażenie.
Necesitamos guerreros bien equipados para defender nuestros edificios. En esta lista verás lo que necesitamos para preparar unos equipos decentes.
Precisamos de guerreiros bem equipados para defender nossas construções. Eis uma lista de coleta para começarmos a preparar equipamentos de qualidade.
Do you have all that ore yet?
Hast du schon das ganze Erz?
Udało ci się zebrać całą rudę?
The King wishes to build a castle 'larger than any in Albion'. We've drawn up plans for a pretty big castle, and we need you to shift this cartload of mortar for the walls.

Der König möchte ein Schloss bauen, „welches größer ist als jedes andere in Albion“. Wir haben Zeichnungen für ein ziemlich großes Schloss angefertigt und wir brauchen dich, um diese Wagenladung Mörtel für die Mauern zu verschieben.
Le Roi souhaite construire « le plus grand château d'Albion ». Nous avons dessiné les plans d'un immense château et avons besoin de vous pour déplacer ce chargement de mortier destiné aux murs.
Наш король пожелал построить "самый большой в Альбионе замок". Мы тут уже нарисовали чертежи, и теперь нужно доставить на месту вот эту здоровую телегу с раствором.
Król pragnie wybudować „największy zamek w Albionie”. Stworzyliśmy projekt naprawdę wielkiego zamku i potrzebujemy twojej pomocy przy transporcie zaprawy murarskiej, która posłuży do budowy murów.
El Rey quiere construir el castillo «más grande de Albion». Hemos hecho unos planos para uno bastante grande y necesitamos que lleves esta carreta llena de mortero para los muros.
O rei deseja construir um castelo “maior que qualquer outro em Albion”. Desenhamos as plantas baixas de um castelo bem grande e precisamos que você transporte esta argamassa para as paredes.
Thanks for hauling the mortar. And if you happen to stumble across any really huge castles while you explore Albion... just don't tell anyone, okay?
Danke für den Transport des Mörtels. Und falls du während der Erkundung von Albion auf irgendwelche wirklich großen Schlösser stößt … Sag es einfach niemandem, in Ordnung?
Merci d'avoir transporté le mortier. Et si vous tombez sur des châteaux vraiment colossaux tandis que vous explorez Albion... surtout ne le dites à personne, d'accord ?
Спасибо вам за помощь. А если вдруг найдете замок больше нашего… то никому не говорите, ладно?
Dzięki za pomoc w transporcie zaprawy. A jeśli w swoich podróżach przez Albion natrafisz na jakieś ogromne zamki… nie mów o tym nikomu, dobra?
Gracias por traer el mortero. Y si, por casualidad, te encuentras con algún castillo más grande en tus viajes por Albion, haz el favor de no contárselo a nadie.
Obrigado por transportar a argamassa. Se, por acaso, você tropeçar por qualquer castelo gigante enquanto explora Albion... por favor, não conte a ninguém, está certo?
Furnaces are dying in the cold nights... ship these sacks of coal up to my mates to make sure they can keep the ore smelting - and the recruits off their arses - at night!
Öfen gehen in diesen kalten Nächten aus … Liefere meinen Kollegen diese Kohlensäcke, um sicherzustellen, dass sie nachts weiterhin Erz schmelzen – und sich die Rekruten vom Leib halten können!
Des fourneaux se meurent dans le froid de la nuit... Livrez ces sacs de charbon à mes amis afin qu'ils puissent continuer à faire fondre le minerai (et de sorte à occuper les recrues) la nuit !
Холодными ночами так трудно поддерживать плавильные печи… доставьте эти мешки с углем, и наши рекруты с радостью будут плавить руду даже ночью!
Piece wygasają podczas zimnych nocy… Dostarcz te worki węgla moim pomocnikom, żeby mogli wytapiać rudę całą noc i zostawili ich w spokoju ci przeklęci rekruci!
Los hornos se apagan durante la fría noche... Lleva estos sacos de carbón a mis compadres para que puedan seguir fundiendo el mineral (y despistando a los reclutas) durante la noche.
As fornalhas estão apagando nas noites frias... Leve estes sacos de carvão para meus camaradas continuarem a fundir o minério e os recrutas continuarem a trabalhar à noite!
Well, they'll be warmer if they're working, too!
Nun, ihnen wird wärmer sein, wenn sie auch arbeiten!
En tout cas, ils auront toujours plus chaud en travaillant !
Ну а что, пока работают, им даже теплее!
Cóż, jak będą pracować, to będzie im cieplej!
¡Seguro que no pasan frío si están trabajando!
Bem, eles também vão se aquecer enquanto trabalharem!

Turns out ale is big business in a continent at war... who knew? The king wants to get in on it early, and is establishing breweries throughout the known settlements. Drop these yeast samples off so our great king can have his monopoly.

Es stellt sich heraus, dass sich auf einem Kontinent im Krieg mit Bier ein großes Geschäft machen lässt … Wer hätte das gedacht? Der König möchte früh einsteigen und eröffnet Brauereien in den bekannten Siedlungen. Lade diese Hefeproben ab, damit dein großartiger König sein Monopol behält.

Le commerce de la bière s'avère très lucratif sur un continent en guerre... Qui l'aurait cru ? Le Roi veut s'y mettre rapidement et installe des brasseries dans toutes les colonies connues. Apportez ces échantillons de levure pour que notre grand Roi puisse établir son monopole.

Оказывается, во времена войны варить эль – чертовски прибыльное дело. Король уже отдал приказ выстроить пивоварни в каждом известном поселении. Доставьте эти дрожжи по адресу, и скоро мы установим монополию.

Okazuje się, że gdy kontynent ogarnięty jest wojną, na piwie można zrobić niezły interes… Kto by pomyślał? Król pragnie szybko to wykorzystać i nakazał budowę browarów we wszystkich znanych osadach. Dostarcz te próbki drożdży, żeby nasz wspaniały Król zapewnił sobie monopol.

Al parecer la cerveza es un gran negocio en un continente en guerra... ¿Quién lo diría? El Rey quiere subirse al carro cuanto antes y está abriendo destilerías en todos los asentamientos conocidos. Lleva estas muestras de levadura para que nuestro rey pueda levantar su monopolio.

Parece que a cerveja é uma mercadoria valorizada em tempos de guerra — quem diria? O rei quer que comecemos o quanto antes a abrir cervejarias nas aldeias conhecidas. Leve estas amostras de levedura para que o nosso grande rei tenha seu monopólio.
As though he isn't making enough gold in taxes...
Als ob er durch Steuern nicht genügend Gold einnimmt …
Comme s'il n'avait pas déjà assez d'or comme ça grâce aux impôts...
А то ему с налогов денег мало…
Jakby nie starczało mu złota z podatków…
Como si no le llegase con los impuestos del oro...
Parece que o ouro dos impostos não é suficiente...
If we're going to build this area up, we're going to need to know what we're building! Deliver these blueprints right away, so our lads and lasses know what they should be doing.
Wenn wir diese Gegend aufbauen sollen, müssen wir wissen, was wir bauen! Liefere diese Pläne sofort, sodass unsere Jungs und Mädels wissen, was sie tun sollen.
Pour développer cette zone, il faudrait déjà savoir ce que nous y construisons ! Livrez immédiatement ces plans, que le peuple sache ce qu'il doit faire.
Чтобы застроить эту местность, нам нужно знать, что, собственно, нужно строить! Доставьте эти чертежи, чтобы наши строители могли начать работу.
Jeśli mamy zabudować ten teren, musimy dokładnie wiedzieć, co budujemy! Dostarcz te plany natychmiast, żeby nasze chłopaki i dzierlatki wiedzieli, co mają robić.
Si vamos a edificar en esta zona, ¡tendremos que saber qué vamos a construir! Entrega estos proyectos de inmediato para que los muchachos sepan qué tienen que hacer.
Se vamos construir nesta área, precisaremos saber o que vamos construir! Entregue estas plantas para nossos amigos e amigas saberem o que eles vão fazer.
Hopefully this'll put an end to those houses without doors...
Hoffentlich wird das diesen Häusern ohne Türen ein Ende bereiten …
Avec un peu de chance, cela mettra fin aux maisons sans porte...
Надеюсь, я больше не увижу домов без дверей и с тремя стенами…
Może wreszcie skończą się te problemy z domami bez drzwi…
Esperemos poder poner fin así a las casas sin puertas.
Tomara que isto dê um basta nessas casas sem porta...
The foremost composer in all of Albion has been tasked with writing an epic ballad to mark the arrival of the king in the summer - get these music sheets to him!
Der beste Komponist in Albion hat die Aufgabe erhalten, eine epische Ballade für die Ankunft des Königs im Sommer zu schreiben – bringe ihm diese Notenblätter!
Le compositeur le plus en vue d'Albion s'est vu confier la tâche de composer une ballade épique en l'honneur de l'arrivée du Roi cet été. Apportez-lui ces partitions !
Величайший композитор Альбиона получил заказ: сложить эпическую балладу к прибытию короля. Доставьте ему эти ноты!
Najprzedniejszy kompozytor w całym Albionie otrzymał zadanie napisania epickiej ballady, która uświetni letnią wizytę Króla. Zanieś mu ten papier nutowy!
Se le ha encargado al compositor más celebre de todo Albion una balada épica para marcar la llegada estival del Rey. ¡Llévale estas partituras!
O eminente compositor de Albion foi incumbido de escrever uma balada épica para marcar a chegada do rei ao verão. Leve estas partituras para ele!
Heaven forfend there's one bum note in this three hour flatter...
Und wehe in dieser dreistündigen Schmeichelei ist auch nur eine Note schief …
Pourvu qu'il n'y ait pas de fausse note dans cet éloge de trois heures...
А вот эта нота явно фальшивит…
Na niebiosa, oby w tym trzygodzinnym peanie nie było ani jednej fałszywej nuty…
Dios no quiera que haya una nota desafinada en tres horas de halagos...
Tomara que haja pelo menos uma nota certa nessas três horas de bajulação...
Our geomancers have just finished their latest surveys of this area, and we need to get them back to the King as soon as possible!
Unsere Geomanten haben gerade ihre neuesten Gutachten über dieses Gelände fertiggestellt und wir müssen sie so schnell wie möglich zurück zum König bringen!
Nos géomanciens viennent de terminer leurs enquêtes sur cette zone. Nous devons les amener au Roi au plus vite !
Наши геомаги только что закончили исследовать местность. Нужно доставить результаты королю – немедленно!
Nasi geomanci właśnie ukończyli najnowsze badania tego rejonu i musimy jak najszybciej dostarczyć wyniki Królowi!
Nuestros geomantes acaban de terminar sus últimos estudios en esta zona y tenemos que llevárselos al Rey cuanto antes.
Nossos geomantes concluíram as últimas sondagens nesta área, e precisamos levá-las ao rei o quanto antes!
Don't look at it for too long, you'll fall asleep with boredom!
Sieh sie dir nicht zu lange an, du wirst vor Langeweile einschlafen!
Ne fixez pas trop longtemps, vous allez vous endormir d'ennui !
Не стоит слишком долго их читать – уснете со скуки.
Nie przyglądaj się temu zbyt długo, bo z nudów zaśniesz!
¡No los mires mucho rato o te dormirás del aburrimiento!
Não olhe para elas tempo demais, senão você vai cair no sono de tédio!
Meister von allem, was er begutachtet
Maestro de todo lo que estudia
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
Du hast immerhin minimale Kompetenz gezeigt. Bringe dies zu [variable:AGENT_A] und du erhältst vielleicht eine interessante Aufgabe.
Vous semblez avoir au moins quelques compétences rudimentaires. Apportez ceci à [variable:AGENT_A] et vous obtiendrez peut-être des missions plus intéressantes.
Похоже, вам можно доверять. Вот, возьмите. Вас ожидает [variable:AGENT_A] и новые интересные задания.
Stwierdzam, że udało ci się wykazać co najmniej podstawowe umiejętności. Adresatem tego listu jest [variable:AGENT_A]. Dostarcz go, a może dostaniesz więcej ciekawych zleceń.
Por lo menos has demostrado un mínimo de competencia. Llévale esto a [variable:AGENT_A] y puede que te ofrezca algún trabajillo interesante.
Você mostrou ter um mínimo de competência. Leve isto para [variable:AGENT_A], é possível que haja trabalhos interessantes para você.
You have the letter of recommendation?
Vous avez la lettre de recommandation ?
Those damned Heretic mages keep setting fire to our wagons. Go teach them a lesson - and try not to take a dagger in the back while you're at it!
Last patrol came back without any eyebrows - close call there!
Every time we step outside the walls, we get peppered with arrows - and even if we hit one of the bastards, they're back on their feet in a trice. Go and cause some more permanent damage, would you?
I hope you remembered your shield?
OK, the captain's getting fed up with Heretics harassing our convoys, and he wants to see results. Get out there and kill anything that moves.
I can still see- oh wait, that was a rabbit.
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
You have the letter of recommendation?

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Patrols need better bows, also other hand implements for when they're feeling brave.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Old leathers smell too much to be used.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
More equipment for patrols, their routes are becoming more and more dangerous'
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Need range of staffs for training mages in different kinds of magic.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Bloody moths!
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Equipment for patrolling mages. They patrol in the dark mainly.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Patrols need capes to stay dry, and bags to collect firewood.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Need tools to collect resources to build watchtowers in remote new settlements.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Old tools are all blunt. Couldn't skin a stick of butter with this knife!
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Provide selection of weapons for recruits. Back in my day we got a sword and we liked it. Kids these days don't know how good they have it.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Replacement armor needed for patrols, damp causing rust in existing equipment, and general misery.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Increasing patrol sizes to newer areas on the continent so need more equipment!
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.
If we want to equip our patrols properly, we're going to need to upgrade our military buildings to make better gear. Get out there and gather wood and stone to improve facilities.
You'll need more common resources as well if you want to upgrade something, mind.

You know why Hunters are great on patrol? Because they know what being on the other side of the fence is like. Gather some resources to make bows and leather armour, so we can put their skills to good use.
You're going to need to kill some wolves, by the way. Hope you're prepared for that!
We need to you conjour some resources for our mages... Ha! Do you see what I did there? Because they use magic? Well, I thought it was funny.
Of course you can't actually 'conjour' resources - you have to go out and gather them yourself. By hand. Sorry. But you know about the circle of production, right? You've got this.
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
You have the letter of recommendation?
If we're going to sustain this pace of production, we're going to need more tools - and for that, we need more wood and more ore! Go out and harvest some, so we can keep on schedule.
Life would be much easier if tools didn't wear out over time...

Warriors are brave, bold, valiant... er... other words like that. They're also pretty damn reckless. Get us some ore and hide and fiber so we can whip them up some armor that can protect them from themselves...
The amount of them I've seen running headlong into trees... Killed one of them once!

There's a shipment of oil here for our boys and girls patrolling the outlands. The poor buggers work day and night, rain or shine. Give them something to burn on a campfire or lanterns, for some small comfort.
Creature comforts are few and far between on the remote patrols!

We're running a bit low on liquid refreshment for the troops, and it's vital for morale that we keep supplies topped up. Luckily I've managed to source some totally legit substitute - just read the label, it's "natural" and "enriched", so it's gotta be good, right?
No, I don't know what it's actually enriched *with*...

Our rations chef has devised a special dish for the patrols; chilled pig fat chowder with freshly grated tree bark. Its making was the most abominable horror I have ever witnessed, but it has all the nutrients a marching guard needs. Deliver these barrels of it to our logistics people, and... don't breathe near it.
Have you delivered the chowder yet? The troops will be so grateful...

You've probably noticed already that it can get a little chilly at night? Some of our night sentries are getting so cold they're falling asleep at their posts, and we can't have that. I need you to deliver these animal furs to keep them awake and alert.
Yes, we noticed the smell too, but we figured it'd help keep them awake.

Psst! Listen, I have a package I have to get to a friend of mine, but I need it done in complete secret. I'd do it myself but too many people know my face 'round here. Get it done quickly and cleanly and I'll trust you enough to give you more... interesting work in the future.

Has the bird landed yet? The bird, landed... you - the package is the bird, and you dropping it off is the landing. The bird... just - never mind! I mean have you delivered the package yet? Actually, I don't want to know. It might implicate me. Go away!
We need these maps of patrol routes distributed to the guards, with the utmost care I must add. These mustn't fall into the hands of highwaymen or raiders, or, gods forbid, the Heretic pests!
No, you're supposed to deliver the patrol routes, not follow them yourself!
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
You have the letter of recommendation?

The lady with the axe, we want her gone. She's putting the fear of hell into my troops - well, that and the fear of losing an arm! The male troops are worried about going for a piss in case... She's got to be stopped!
I come out in a cold sweat just thinking about it sometimes!

The chief savages can break a skull with a single swing of their hammers. Lives snuffed out in a single moment. They're thinning our ranks far too quickly; we need the threat dealt with now, not later.
It's a bloody horror for troop morale to see them all go so quickly...
We're finding outposts torn down in the area, and there always seem to be axe marks all over the ruins. Find out who's responsible and demonstrate our displeasure.
And by 'demonstrate our displeasure' I mean 'kill them all', of course.
Private Cotton claims his entire patrol was butchered by cross-eyed madmen. Captain wants someone to go and look into it, and it looks like you drew the short straw this time.
Between you and me, I suspect Private Cotton may be making it all up.
Our people keep getting killed by maniacs, but they're suspiciously well-organized. There's got to be someone else directing them. Find out who, and ask them nicely to stop.
I hope you understood the subtext there. Here, let me spell it out: IF THEY DON'T STOP, KILL THEM ALL. Clear? Good.
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
You have the letter of recommendation?

There's a right sharpshooter in the midst of the undead - well, I suppose they have had two lifetimes to practice... We need them got rid of, we can't make any kind of push on the crypts until they're gone!
Hopefully we'll be able to make it through now that we're not losing an eye or two every time we try...

The Deathlords of the Undead have some ancient ability, honed over centuries, trained in this world and the next... The ability to scare the pants off my troops! Get them out of the way, the new recruits can't fight when their thighs are chafing with their own piss!
It's not like we need any more obstructions to good hygiene up here...

The Lieutenants of the Undead just march around aimlessly, like they're looking for their lost troops. I almost feel sorry for them. But then I think about how many of us they've killed. Put them out of their misery, will you?
The burden of a lieutenant... To have all of those lives on your shoulders. It's a dark place to stick a soul for eternity.
We've had worrying reports of the dead rising from their graves and living again. Also, battling again. Head over to some graveyards and see... well, see if they can die again?
Just keep hitting them, I'm told that's the trick.

The bad news is that the dead are rising from their graves, and the worse news is they seem to be somewhat militant. Your orders are to head out and destruction-test their tactics, see if they've got any surprises up their sleeves.
I'll be honest, I'm not expecting you to find that they're military geniuses. But we need to be sure!
The Captain has a theory that, if the Undead are animated by magic, killing their mages might cause them all to collapse. Go and test that, would you?
I can't say I'm optimistic about this one, but Captain's orders...

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Replacing losses from wear and tear due to endless training exercises.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Troops wish to experiment with alternative weaponry.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Farms have rats. Rats eat leather. You do the math.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Need replacement staffs, old ones are worn out. Keep misfiring. Nasty business.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Wish to acquire some advanced staffs for skilled mages.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Require more comfortable armor. Also more reading material.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Dear sir/madam, I hope this finds you well. My master has asked me to acquire more bags and capes, and this necessitates the completion of this requisition form detailing the reasoning for my needing more bags and capes. Yours Sincerely, George.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Need tools for building walls and fences. No, not just around my gardens. I'm going to use them to help others, too!
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Need general implements to facilitate destruction of wildlife for the good of humans.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
If you're going to make my girls and boys stand around all day guarding a damn farm, the least you can do is give them decent equipment.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Why do you *think* I want more weapons? To make handkerchiefs?'
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
I need some armor. For my troops. I hate paperwork.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

Food is our priority right now: we need fields, mills, butchers and so on. Lots of infrastructure needs building, and we need YOU to gather wood and stone to help with that. So go on, get out there and chop slash mine delete as appropriate.
Everybody's gotta eat, right? In fact I- I'm hungry right now!
Hunters tend to be particularly sharp-eyed, which makes them great at watching out for trouble. Gather resources for some Hunter equipment so we can mount a proper watch on our storehouses.
Yep, they're sharp-eyed all right. And interestingly, they don't eat much. Perfect for the job!

A bit of magic would beef up our agricultural defenses - nothing says "don't steal that" like a good old-fashioned fireball to the face. But... we'll need resources to produce their equipment, of course. That's your job today.
Actually, now that I think about it, it's possible that throwing fireballs around on a farm isn't the greatest idea...
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
You have the letter of recommendation?
To run proper farms, we're going to need a good selection of tools. Which will require resources, which will be gathered by you. Right? Right.
If we treat our farmyard beasts like royalty, they'll bring us sovereign produce. No, I'm not making a joke about the King.
Some stout warriors to protect our food stores would be a good idea, no? And for that, we need ore and hide. Off you toddle, collect some up. Thankyou kindly!
Wouldn't want anyone applying a five-finger discount to our wares, afterall. Or a five-sack discount, for that mater.

The farmers need tools to keep the animals healthy; rasps for trimming hooves, hammers and chisels for shoeing... all of which can coincidentally also be used for preparing cheese! Ah, those farmers are resourceful.
There's a bit of a taste but you get used to it.
I need you to take this giant pile of ripe manure to a farm somewhere. Now, please.
I don't care which farm, so long as it's a long way away.

There's reports that crows have been decimating the farms they're trying to get going up north. These are some shirts and doublets from last year; apparently they're no longer in vogue back home, so they can be used for dressing scarecrows. Deliver them to my colleague for distribution.
You know there's actually someone who styles and dresses these scarecrows? That's a job someone is paid real money to do.

We've had reports of rat infestations at some of the smaller farms in the west, so I need you to take these semi-feral kittens we...er, acquired, and deliver them to the farmers. So yes, you're carrying a bag of kittens. Enjoy.
These kittens are vicious, you understand, not meant for pets - and I'll know if you take one.

Right, be careful with these; they're very delicate... and, well, there's a distinct buzzing noise coming from inside, we reckon there's a few live ones in there. When you've delivered them, you can rest proud in the knowledge that you ensured the king and his courtiers can have a bit of honey in their tea of a morning. Ah... It's a valiant war we're fighting.
The farms in the east get freezing at night; the poor cows who happened to get shipped over there are suffering! Get this hay over to them so we can keep them nice and warm and... alive.
Apparently their milk's freezing in their udders! Nasty way to go...
You've demonstrated at least some minimal competence. Take this to [variable:AGENT_A] and you might get some more interesting work.
You have the letter of recommendation?
You have served Albion well, friend. Take this token to [variable:AGENT_A], that you may serve further.
Service does the land honour, friend.
A talented archer of old is now training his bow on our peaceful hunting parties. This threat must be removed; we cannot lose another soul to it.
Is the deed done, friend? Can we enter the night unshielded once more?

The Deathlords bring death to this land. Their mists shrivel mighty trees and turn beautiful flowers wizened and gray. Nothing can live while they poison the earth. Relinquish their hold on this sacred life!
Wrest Albion from their grasp, before it's too late!

The Lieutenants yearn to lead, to protect, to be followed; they do not understand that their troops are gone, either travelled to the world beyond, or awakened, and hopelessly pursuing the traces of their old selves. Assuage their yearning for battle.
To ride into war once more... That is their only wish. A great and noble death.
These Undead soldiers persist in digging holes in the ground. Do they perhaps seek more of their comrades? No matter, they disturb things that should not be disturbed. Stop them.
How goes the fight? Is the silent earth free from Undead machinations?
I have directed my people to keep their distance from the Undead, but their archers and mages continue to harass us. Please, for their own good, dissuade them.
What need has a walking skeleton of magic, anyway?
Much as we would like to leave them in peace, the Undead in this area risk disturbing something... something that they should not. Drive them away before something unpleasant happens.
There are darker things here than the risen dead.
You have helped us dull the ache of the Undead hoard. Take this note of recommendation to [variable:AGENT_A], and my thanks.
Continue to serve Morgana, outsider, and you could soon find yourself brought among her Knights.

Their arrows cannot pierce our armor, but they know where to shoot for uncovered flesh; the neck, the groin, the grooves of our helms. Our knights bleed to death before they know they've been hit. Make sure you give them the same slow fate.
I want them to feel their stolen half-lives drain from them slowly.

Do you feel your legs grow heavy as you enter that mist? That's the Deathlords. Their magic can put you into a deathly sleep if you are exposed to it for too long. So be quick killing them, won't you dear?
Don't worry, if you do get sent under, we'll always be right behind you ready to awaken you...
These Lieutenants believe they still rule armies, unaware that their orders are barked to no one but themselves. Ha! Show them their place, will you sweet?
Their words hold no power now. Show them.
The magic-wielding dead are tiresome - not strong enough to expend energy on; not weak enough to ignore. Deal with them, and prove that you have some character.
Don't return to me until you've finished the work.
How can skeletons loose arrows this fast? Break their bows, and break their bones.
Those husks clad in iron. The Undead call them soldiers, but they are not what they once were. They are merely relics of forgotten wars. Remind them of that.
These husks are hollow, their victories forgotten. They are to be shown no mercy.
Heretic thieves are rushing in to stab us in the backs, while their archers pick us off from afar. We need to break through them if we want to move ahead. And we do want that.
Have you made it through this damn wall of Heretics yet? You've been given a lot of responsibility now; we're trusting you with this.
We want to make sure that, when the Heretic leaders go down, they stay down. Make sure their healers don't interfere with our plans.
We're not sure if they can actually resurrect people, but we don't want to find out the hard way.
We suspect that the higher-ranking Heretic mages are acting as advisers to their leadership. Taking some of them out of the picture might make bringing the whole organization down much easier.
They surely cannot survive much more of this.

The lower ranks have reported a huge woman walking around throwing axes at anything that moves. We'd hoped that they were just making her up, but my Lieutenant saw her this morning. Fancy like dealing with her for us, too? Confirmed: she is darned frightening!
Poor lad will need a pair of new breeches after that little encounter.
One of those Chieftain blokes went on a rampage after we slaughtered his tribe. Yes, it's understandable, but yes, we want him eliminated. Just... Put him out of his misery will you?
It's not like we can even spare their women... They'd put an axe in your head just as quick!
This is the very edge of our influence in Albion, and I'm fed up with pulling axes out of the outer walls every morning. It's time to stop being defensive, and strike out into the continent!
It'd be better for them if they'd just leave us alone.
We believe the druids are directing Keeper attacks. You'll need to deal with their berserkers to get to them, though.
If they're so smart, why do they keep getting in our way?
We've tried everything else - how about you just go and kill as many Keepers as you can find, and see if that convinces them to back off.
I find this sort of order distasteful, personally, but they're forcing our hand.

Captain wants this archer dealt with; apparently they've had one causing problems in the lower ranks... Seems they're now coordinating their attacks to distract us for some kind of plan. Make sure we don't find out that plan is, right?
We don't want to wait long enough to find out what they've got planned for us... Best kill the damn archer first.

The Undead Deathlords are apparently causing some er... mess in the lower ranks. Well, they've now turned to us, too, and though we're no cowards, I'm struggling to keep my troops in line when they enter that mist. Go and get rid of them for us, too.
We can't afford to mess these beautiful trousers - they cost far too much!
The Undead Lieutenants are angry, lost. I'm thinking they need a bit of guidance to work out where they're going. Lead them back to their graves, will you?
Have you taken them to their final destination? Make sure they stay down there, this time.
This Undead menace needs to be halted in its tracks. Destroy their front-line fighters so we can do some real damage.
The uprising of Undead is getting out of hand. You'll need to deal with their archers if you're going to have any luck pushing them back.
I wonder where they're getting all their arrows?
The Undead could be a serious threat to our presence here, and their mages are the biggest headache. Please, go and thin their numbers a little!

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Please send more bows. Lots more bows.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Seeing more close-quarter action than anticipated. Many dead. Improvements needed.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

The King has authorized a subsidy in silver for any individual who crafts the items listed in the attached work order, for the reason:
Wear and tear/damage from enemy troops/lost due to dead soldiers.
Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.

Please report to your assigned Artisanal contact when the work is completed.
